title: Getting Started with Flutter
description: Learn the basics of Flutter and set up your development environment.

subSteps.title: Install Flutter SDK
subSteps.description: Download and install the Flutter SDK for your operating system.

subSteps.title: Set up an IDE
subSteps.description: Install and configure either Android Studio or VS Code for Flutter development.

subSteps.title: Create Your First Flutter App
subSteps.description: Build and run a simple Flutter app to ensure your setup is working correctly.

title: Flutter Basics
description: Learn the fundamental concepts of Flutter development.

subSteps.title: Widgets and the Widget Tree
subSteps.description: Understand the core concept of widgets in Flutter and how they form the UI.

subSteps.title: Stateless vs Stateful Widgets
subSteps.description: Learn the difference between stateless and stateful widgets and when to use each.

subSteps.title: Basic Layout Widgets
subSteps.description: Explore common layout widgets like Container, Row, Column, and Stack.

title: Flutter UI Development
description: Dive deeper into creating beautiful and responsive user interfaces.

subSteps.title: Material Design
subSteps.description: Implement Material Design principles in your Flutter app.

subSteps.title: Cupertino (iOS-style) widgets
subSteps.description: Learn how to use Cupertino widgets for iOS-style interfaces.

subSteps.title: Responsive and Adaptive UI
subSteps.description: Create UIs that work well on various screen sizes and orientations.

title: State Management
description: Learn different approaches to manage state in Flutter applications.

subSteps.title: setState and StatefulWidget
subSteps.description: Understand the basics of state management using setState.

subSteps.title: Provider
subSteps.description: Learn how to use the Provider package for more complex state management.

subSteps.title: BLoC Pattern
subSteps.description: Explore the BLoC (Business Logic Component) pattern for state management.

title: Navigation and Routing
description: Learn how to implement navigation and routing in Flutter apps.

subSteps.title: Basic Navigation
subSteps.description: Implement simple navigation between screens using Navigator.

subSteps.title: Named Routes
subSteps.description: Use named routes for more organized navigation in larger apps.

subSteps.title: Advanced Routing
subSteps.description: Explore more advanced routing techniques and packages like go_router.

title: Working with Data
description: Learn how to work with data in Flutter applications.

subSteps.title: Networking and HTTP
subSteps.description: Make HTTP requests and handle responses in Flutter.

subSteps.title: JSON Serialization
subSteps.description: Learn how to serialize and deserialize JSON data.

subSteps.title: Local Storage
subSteps.description: Implement local data persistence using packages like shared_preferences or sqflite.

title: Advanced Flutter
description: Explore advanced topics and best practices in Flutter development.

subSteps.title: Custom Animations
subSteps.description: Create complex, custom animations in Flutter.

subSteps.title: Platform-Specific Code
subSteps.description: Learn how to write platform-specific code for iOS and Android.

subSteps.title: Testing and Debugging
subSteps.description: Implement unit, widget, and integration tests, and learn advanced debugging techniques.

subSteps.title: Performance Optimization
subSteps.description: Learn techniques to optimize your Flutter app's performance.
